sense.name: Complain about something or say mean things to someone.
sense.examples: What was he bitching about? She bitched out that girl hard core. Stop bitching and start playing football!

sense.name: BITCH SLAP: hit with an open hand in an insulting manner.
sense.examples: He bitch slapped his opponent. She bitch slapped her boyfriend and he started to cry.

sense.name: Make someone one's sexual or social slave, generally in a prison context.
sense.examples: He was bitched early on by one of the reigning kings of the cell block. You've got to bitch someone before you get bitched.
